title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the requirements for the LazyConcurrentDataStreams library, including its intended functionality, performance goals, and target platforms.

title: Design Library Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the LazyConcurrentDataStreams library, focusing on its core components (such as Stream, Transform, Scheduler), data structures (like PriorityQueue, RingBuffer), and interfaces. The design should leverage functional programming's strengths in handling infinite sequences and parallelism.

title: Implement Core Functionality
description: Implement the core functionality of the library, including lazy data stream processing, concurrency handling, and functional programming constructs.

title: Develop Testing Framework
description: Design and implement a comprehensive testing framework for the LazyConcurrentDataStreams library, including unit tests, integration tests, and performance tests.

title: Write Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the LazyConcurrentDataStreams library, including API references, usage examples, and developer guides.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Identify and implement security measures to ensure the LazyConcurrentDataStreams library is secure and resistant to common threats and vulnerabilities.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for the LazyConcurrentDataStreams library, including automated builds, testing, and deployment to package repositories.
